channel.title: Data Engineering on Chris Paraiso
channel.description: Recent content in Data Engineering on Chris Paraiso

item.title: Unlocking the Data Universe: Embarking on a Data Engineer Journey
item.description: I’ve been in the software engineering field since 2009 with a focus on front-end development and UI/UX. This is funny to me because when I first started learning web development back in the early 2000s, I avoided JavaScript like the plague. I would only touch the HTML and CSS of the website. The design was all I cared about. Now, JavaScript is all I do. The Now Currently, my team is contracted by Cisco to convert and migrate their Networking Academy application to replace all unsupported Flash assets into Canvas.
